column5: I've been tryin to respond to your PM for the last couple days. It says you arn't a member? So i'm horribly confused here, cause your info comes up when i click your name. Email me if your inbox is FUBAR.  dreddick AT kos DOT net  The rest of you lurkers please don't sign me up for any clown on monkey gang bangs or Conservative party news letters. I view both with equal contempt. -R-
Or you could just get him to PM you
What lodge did you work for, and if its the one we were going to go to, are you working there next year?

Ramble, do yourself a favour and get rid of the . and the @ in your email address.  use DOT and AND instead..  You'll end up with all kinds of junk email from scanners that are constantly searching forums for email addresses to spam.
Thanks Bill. I wasn't thinking of that.  Fishnfever i work at Kesagami in the summer.  -R-
